architecture_overview: A scalable web application hosted on AWS with load balancing, auto-scaling, and distributed data storage for high availability and performance.

components.name: Elastic Load Balancer (ELB)
components.description: Distributes incoming traffic across web servers and app servers.

components.name: Auto Scaling Group
components.description: Automatically adjusts web/app server count based on demand.

components.name: Amazon RDS
components.description: Relational database with standby instance for high availability.

components.name: Amazon S3
components.description: Stores static content like images and files.

components.name: Amazon CloudFront
components.description: CDN for accelerating static and dynamic content delivery.

data_flows.description: HTTP requests routed via Route 53 to the ELB
Traffic distributed to scalable web/app servers
Application logic interacts with relational database
